query:
SELECT b.id, b.name, b.total_numbers, b.processed_numbers, b.status, b.checked_at,
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hlr_results WHERE batch_id = b.id) as saved_results
FROM hlr_batches b 
ORDER BY b.id DESC 
LIMIT 10;
command:

       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hlr_results WHERE batch_id = b.id) as saved_results
